00041 #define HOOK_AVAIL(var, hook_name)                 (var->hooks && var->hooks->hook_name)
00042 #define HOOK_FUNC(var, hook_name)                  (var->hooks->hook_name)
00043 #define HOOK_ARGS(var, hook_name)                  var->hooks->hook_name ## _arg
00044 
00045 #define HOOK_REQUEST_RUN(request, hook_name, ...)  do {                                       \
00046         if (HOOK_AVAIL(request, hook_name)) {                                                 \
00047             return HOOK_FUNC(request, hook_name) (request, __VA_ARGS__,                       \
00048                                                   HOOK_ARGS(request, hook_name));             \
00049         }                                                                                     \
00050                                                                                               \
00051         if (HOOK_AVAIL(request->conn, hook_name)) {                                           \
00052             return HOOK_FUNC(request->conn, hook_name) (request, __VA_ARGS__,                 \
00053                                                         HOOK_ARGS(request->conn, hook_name)); \
00054         }                                                                                     \
00055 } while (0)
00056 
00057 #define HOOK_REQUEST_RUN_NARGS(request, hook_name) do {                                       \
00058         if (HOOK_AVAIL(request, hook_name)) {                                                 \
00059             return HOOK_FUNC(request, hook_name) (request,                                    \
00060                                                   HOOK_ARGS(request, hook_name));             \
00061         }                                                                                     \
00062                                                                                               \
00063         if (HOOK_AVAIL(request->conn, hook_name)) {                                           \
00064             return HOOK_FUNC(request->conn, hook_name) (request,                              \
00065                                                         HOOK_ARGS(request->conn, hook_name)); \
00066         }                                                                                     \
00067 } while (0);
00068 
00069 #define _evhtp_lock(h)                             do { \
00070         if (h->lock) {                                  \
00071             pthread_mutex_lock(h->lock);                \
00072         }                                               \
00073 } while (0)
00074 
00075 #define _evhtp_unlock(h)                           do { \
00076         if (h->lock) {                                  \
00077             pthread_mutex_unlock(h->lock);              \
00078         }                                               \
00079 } while (0)

00095 static int
00096 status_code_cmp(void * _a, void * _b) {
00097     struct status_code * a = _a;
00098     struct status_code * b = _b;
00099 
00100     return b->code - a->code;
00101 }

00104 RB_GENERATE(status_code_tree, status_code, entry, status_code_cmp);

00181 const char *
00182 status_code_to_str(evhtp_res code) {
00183     struct status_code   c;
00184     struct status_code * found;
00185 
00186     c.code = code;
00187 
00188     if (!(found = RB_FIND(status_code_tree, &status_code_head, &c))) {
00189         return "DERP";
00190     }
00191 
00192     return found->str;
00193 }

00229 #ifdef NO_STRNLEN
00230 size_t
00231 strnlen(const char * s, size_t maxlen) {
00232     const char * e;
00233     size_t       n;
00234 
00235     for (e = s, n = 0; *e && n < maxlen; e++, n++) {
00236         ;
00237     }
00238 
00239     return n;
00240 }
00241 
00242 #endif
00243 
00244 #ifdef NO_STRNDUP
00245 char *
00246 strndup(const char * s, size_t n) {
00247     size_t len = strnlen(s, n);
00248     char * ret;
00249 
00250     if (len <= n) {
00251         return strdup(s);
00252     }
00253 
00254     ret    = malloc(n + 1);
00255     ret[n] = '\0';
00256 
00257     strncpy(ret, s, n);
00258     return ret;
00259 }
00260 
00261 #endif

00274 static unsigned int
00275 _evhtp_quick_hash(const char * str) {
00276     unsigned int h = 0;
00277 
00278     for (; *str; str++) {
00279         h = 31 * h + *str;
00280     }
00281 
00282     return h;
00283 }

00293 static int
00294 _evhtp_is_http_10(const char major, const char minor) {

00328 static evhtp_proto
00329 _evhtp_protocol(const char major, const char minor) {
00330     if (_evhtp_is_http_10(major, minor)) {
00331         return EVHTP_PROTO_10;
00332     }
00333 
00334     if (_evhtp_is_http_11(major, minor)) {
00335         return EVHTP_PROTO_11;
00336     }
00337 
00338     return EVHTP_PROTO_INVALID;
00339 }

00479 static evhtp_callback_t *
00480 _evhtp_callback_hash_find(evhtp_callbacks_t * callbacks, const char * path) {
00481     evhtp_callback_t * callback;
00482     unsigned int       hash;
00483     unsigned int       shash;
00484 
00485     if (path == NULL) {
00486         return NULL;
00487     }
00488 
00489     hash     = _evhtp_quick_hash(path);
00490     shash    = (hash & (callbacks->buckets - 1));
00491     callback = callbacks->callbacks[shash];
00492 
00493     while (callback != NULL) {
00494         if (callback->hash == hash &&
00495             callback->type == evhtp_callback_type_hash &&
00496             strcmp(callback->val.path, path) == 0) {
00497             return callback;
00498         }
00499 
00500         callback = callback->next;
00501     }
00502 
00503     return NULL;
00504 }
00505 
00519 static evhtp_callback_t *
00520 _evhtp_callback_regex_find(evhtp_callbacks_t * callbacks, const char * path,
00521                            unsigned int * soff, unsigned int * eoff) {
00522     evhtp_callback_t * callback = callbacks->regex_callbacks;
00523 
00524     if (path == NULL) {
00525         return NULL;
00526     }
00527 
00528     while (callback != NULL) {
00529         regmatch_t pmatch[28];
00530 
00531         if (callback->type == evhtp_callback_type_regex) {
00532             if (regexec(callback->val.regex, path, callback->val.regex->re_nsub + 1, pmatch, 0) == 0) {
00533                 *soff = (unsigned int)pmatch[callback->val.regex->re_nsub].rm_so;
00534                 *eoff = (unsigned int)pmatch[callback->val.regex->re_nsub].rm_eo;
00535 
00536                 return callback;
00537             }
00538         }
00539 
00540         callback = callback->next;
00541     }
00542 
00543     return NULL;
00544 }
00545 
00556 static evhtp_callback_t *
00557 _evhtp_callback_find(evhtp_callbacks_t * callbacks,
00558                      const char        * path,
00559                      unsigned int      * start_offset,
00560                      unsigned int      * end_offset) {
00561     evhtp_callback_t * callback;
00562 
00563     if (callbacks == NULL) {
00564         return NULL;
00565     }
00566 
00567     if ((callback = _evhtp_callback_hash_find(callbacks, path)) != NULL) {
00568         *start_offset = 0;
00569         *end_offset   = (unsigned int)strlen(path);
00570         return callback;
00571     }
00572 
00573     if ((callback = _evhtp_callback_regex_find(callbacks, path,
00574                                                start_offset, end_offset)) != NULL) {
00575         return callback;
00576     }
00577 
00578     return NULL;
00579 }

00588 static evhtp_request_t *
00589 _evhtp_request_new(evhtp_connection_t * c) {
00590     evhtp_request_t * req;
00591 
00592     if (!(req = calloc(sizeof(evhtp_request_t), 1))) {
00593         return NULL;
00594     }
00595 
00596     req->conn        = c;
00597     req->htp         = c->htp;
00598     req->status      = EVHTP_RES_OK;
00599     req->buffer_in   = evbuffer_new();
00600     req->buffer_out  = evbuffer_new();
00601     req->headers_in  = malloc(sizeof(evhtp_headers_t));
00602     req->headers_out = malloc(sizeof(evhtp_headers_t));
00603 
00604     TAILQ_INIT(req->headers_in);
00605     TAILQ_INIT(req->headers_out);
00606 
00607     return req;
00608 }

00615 static void
00616 _evhtp_request_free(evhtp_request_t * request) {
00617     if (request == NULL) {
00618         return;
00619     }
00620 
00621     _evhtp_request_fini_hook(request);
00622     _evhtp_uri_free(request->uri);
00623 
00624     evhtp_headers_free(request->headers_in);
00625     evhtp_headers_free(request->headers_out);
00626 
00627     if (request->hooks) {
00628         free(request->hooks);
00629     }
00630 
00631     if (request->buffer_in) {
00632         evbuffer_free(request->buffer_in);
00633     }
00634 
00635     if (request->buffer_out) {
00636         evbuffer_free(request->buffer_out);
00637     }
00638 
00639 
00640     free(request);
00641 }

00664 static void
00665 _evhtp_uri_free(evhtp_uri_t * uri) {
00666     if (uri == NULL) {
00667         return;
00668     }
00669 
00670     evhtp_query_free(uri->query);
00671     _evhtp_path_free(uri->path);
00672 
00673     if (uri->fragment) {
00674         free(uri->fragment);
00675     }
00676 
00677     if (uri->query_raw) {
00678         free(uri->query_raw);
00679     }
00680 
00681     free(uri);
00682 }

00699 static evhtp_path_t *
00700 _evhtp_path_new(const char * data, size_t len) {
00701     evhtp_path_t * req_path;
00702     const char   * data_end = (const char *)(data + len);
00703     char         * path     = NULL;
00704     char         * file     = NULL;
00705 
00706     if (!(req_path = calloc(sizeof(evhtp_path_t), 1))) {
00707         return NULL;
00708     }
00709 
00710     if (len == 0) {
00711         /*
00712          * odd situation here, no preceding "/", so just assume the path is "/"
00713          */
00714         path = strdup("/");
00715     } else if (*data != '/') {
00716         /* request like GET stupid HTTP/1.0, treat stupid as the file, and
00717          * assume the path is "/"
00718          */
00719         path = strdup("/");
00720         file = strndup(data, len);
00721     } else {
00722         if (data[len - 1] != '/') {
00723             /*
00724              * the last character in data is assumed to be a file, not the end of path
00725              * loop through the input data backwards until we find a "/"
00726              */
00727             size_t i;
00728 
00729             for (i = (len - 1); i != 0; i--) {
00730                 if (data[i] == '/') {
00731                     /*
00732                      * we have found a "/" representing the start of the file,
00733                      * and the end of the path
00734                      */
00735                     size_t path_len;
00736                     size_t file_len;
00737 
00738                     path_len = (size_t)(&data[i] - data) + 1;
00739                     file_len = (size_t)(data_end - &data[i + 1]);
00740 
00741                     /* check for overflow */
00742                     if ((const char *)(data + path_len) > data_end) {
00743                         fprintf(stderr, "PATH Corrupted.. (path_len > len)\n");
00744                         free(req_path);
00745                         return NULL;
00746                     }
00747 
00748                     /* check for overflow */
00749                     if ((const char *)(&data[i + 1] + file_len) > data_end) {
00750                         fprintf(stderr, "FILE Corrupted.. (file_len > len)\n");
00751                         free(req_path);
00752                         return NULL;
00753                     }
00754 
00755                     path = strndup(data, path_len);
00756                     file = strndup(&data[i + 1], file_len);
00757 
00758                     break;
00759                 }
00760             }
00761 
00762             if (i == 0 && data[i] == '/' && !file && !path) {
00763                 /* drops here if the request is something like GET /foo */
00764                 path = strdup("/");
00765 
00766                 if (len > 1) {
00767                     file = strndup((const char *)(data + 1), len);
00768                 }
00769             }
00770         } else {
00771             /* the last character is a "/", thus the request is just a path */
00772             path = strndup(data, len);
00773         }
00774     }
00775 
00776     if (len != 0) {
00777         req_path->full = strndup(data, len);
00778     }
00779 
00780     req_path->path = path;
00781     req_path->file = file;
00782 
00783     return req_path;
00784 }     /* _evhtp_path_new */
00785 
00786 static void
00787 _evhtp_path_free(evhtp_path_t * path) {
00788     if (path == NULL) {
00789         return;
00790     }
00791 
00792     if (path->full) {
00793         free(path->full);
00794     }
00795 
00796     if (path->path) {
00797         free(path->path);
00798     }
00799 
00800     if (path->file) {
00801         free(path->file);
00802     }
00803 
00804     if (path->match_start) {
00805         free(path->match_start);
00806     }
00807 
00808     if (path->match_end) {
00809         free(path->match_end);
00810     }
00811 
00812     free(path);
00813 }
00814 
00815 static int
00816 _evhtp_request_parser_start(htparser * p) {
00817     evhtp_connection_t * c = htparser_get_userdata(p);
00818 
00819     if (c->request) {
00820         if (c->request->finished == 1) {
00821             _evhtp_request_free(c->request);
00822         } else {
00823             return -1;
00824         }
00825     }
00826 
00827     if (!(c->request = _evhtp_request_new(c))) {
00828         return -1;
00829     }
00830 
00831     return 0;
00832 }
00833 
00834 static int
00835 _evhtp_request_parser_args(htparser * p, const char * data, size_t len) {
00836     evhtp_connection_t * c   = htparser_get_userdata(p);
00837     evhtp_uri_t        * uri = c->request->uri;
00838 
00839     if (!(uri->query = evhtp_parse_query(data, len))) {
00840         c->request->status = EVHTP_RES_ERROR;
00841         return -1;
00842     }
00843 
00844     uri->query_raw = calloc(len + 1, 1);
00845     memcpy(uri->query_raw, data, len);
00846 
00847     return 0;
00848 }
00849 
00850 static int
00851 _evhtp_request_parser_header_key(htparser * p, const char * data, size_t len) {
00852     evhtp_connection_t * c = htparser_get_userdata(p);
00853     char               * key_s;     /* = strndup(data, len); */
00854     evhtp_header_t     * hdr;
00855 
00856     key_s      = malloc(len + 1);
00857     key_s[len] = '\0';
00858     memcpy(key_s, data, len);
00859 
00860     if ((hdr = evhtp_header_key_add(c->request->headers_in, key_s, 0)) == NULL) {
00861         c->request->status = EVHTP_RES_FATAL;
00862         return -1;
00863     }
00864 
00865     hdr->k_heaped = 1;
00866     return 0;
00867 }
00868 
00869 static int
00870 _evhtp_request_parser_header_val(htparser * p, const char * data, size_t len) {
00871     evhtp_connection_t * c = htparser_get_userdata(p);
00872     char               * val_s;     /* = strndup(data, len); */
00873     evhtp_header_t     * header;
00874 
00875     val_s      = malloc(len + 1);
00876     val_s[len] = '\0';
00877     memcpy(val_s, data, len);
00878 
00879     if ((header = evhtp_header_val_add(c->request->headers_in, val_s, 0)) == NULL) {
00880         c->request->status = EVHTP_RES_FATAL;
00881         return -1;
00882     }
00883 
00884     header->v_heaped = 1;
00885 
00886     if ((c->request->status = _evhtp_header_hook(c->request, header)) != EVHTP_RES_OK) {
00887         return -1;
00888     }
00889 
00890     return 0;
00891 }
00892 
00893 static int
00894 _evhtp_request_parser_path(htparser * p, const char * data, size_t len) {
00895     evhtp_connection_t * c        = htparser_get_userdata(p);
00896     evhtp_hooks_t      * hooks    = NULL;
00897     evhtp_callback_t   * callback = NULL;
00898     evhtp_callback_cb    cb       = NULL;
00899     evhtp_uri_t        * uri;
00900     evhtp_path_t       * path;
00901     void               * cbarg    = NULL;
00902     char               * match_start;
00903     char               * match_end;
00904 
00905     if (!(uri = _evhtp_uri_new())) {
00906         c->request->status = EVHTP_RES_FATAL;
00907         return -1;
00908     }
00909 
00910     if (!(path = _evhtp_path_new(data, len))) {
00911         c->request->status = EVHTP_RES_FATAL;
00912         return -1;
00913     }
00914 
00915     _evhtp_lock(c->htp);
00916 
00917     if ((callback = _evhtp_callback_find(c->htp->callbacks, path->path,
00918                                          &path->matched_soff, &path->matched_eoff))) {
00919         /* matched a callback using *just* the path (/a/b/c/) */
00920         cb    = callback->cb;
00921         cbarg = callback->cbarg;
00922         hooks = callback->hooks;
00923     } else if ((callback = _evhtp_callback_find(c->htp->callbacks, path->full,
00924                                                 &path->matched_soff, &path->matched_eoff))) {
00925         /* matched a callback using both path and file (/a/b/c/d) */
00926         cb    = callback->cb;
00927         cbarg = callback->cbarg;
00928         hooks = callback->hooks;
00929     } else {
00930         /* no callbacks found for either case, use defaults */
00931         cb    = c->htp->defaults.cb;
00932         cbarg = c->htp->defaults.cbarg;
00933 
00934         path->matched_soff = 0;
00935         path->matched_soff = (unsigned int)strlen(path->full);
00936     }
00937 
00938     _evhtp_unlock(c->htp);
00939 
00940     match_start = calloc(strlen(path->full) + 1, 1);
00941     match_end   = calloc(strlen(path->full) + 1, 1);
00942 
00943     memcpy(match_start,
00944            (void *)(path->full + path->matched_soff),
00945            path->matched_eoff);
00946 
00947     memcpy(match_end,
00948            (void *)(path->full + path->matched_eoff),
00949            strlen(path->full) - path->matched_eoff);
00950 
00951     path->match_start = match_start;
00952     path->match_end   = match_end;
00953 
00954     uri->path         = path;
00955     uri->scheme       = htparser_get_scheme(p);
00956 
00957     if (hooks != NULL) {
00958         c->request->hooks = malloc(sizeof(evhtp_hooks_t));
00959 
00960         memcpy(c->request->hooks, hooks, sizeof(evhtp_hooks_t));
00961     }
00962 
00963     c->request->uri    = uri;
00964     c->request->cb     = cb;
00965     c->request->cbarg  = cbarg;
00966     c->request->method = htparser_get_method(p);
00967 
00968     if ((c->request->status = _evhtp_path_hook(c->request, path)) != EVHTP_RES_OK) {
00969         return -1;
00970     }
00971 
00972     return 0;
00973 }     /* _evhtp_request_parser_path */
00974 
00975 static int
00976 _evhtp_request_parser_headers(htparser * p) {
00977     evhtp_connection_t * c = htparser_get_userdata(p);
00978     const char         * expect_val;
00979 
00980     /* XXX proto should be set with htparsers on_hdrs_begin hook */
00981     c->request->keepalive = htparser_should_keep_alive(p);
00982     c->request->proto     = _evhtp_protocol(htparser_get_major(p), htparser_get_minor(p));
00983     c->request->status    = _evhtp_headers_hook(c->request, c->request->headers_in);
00984 
00985     if (c->request->status != EVHTP_RES_OK) {
00986         return -1;
00987     }
00988 
00989 #if 0
00990     if (!evhtp_header_find(c->request->headers_in, "Content-Length")) {
00991         return 0;
00992     }
00993 #endif
00994 
00995     if (!(expect_val = evhtp_header_find(c->request->headers_in, "Expect"))) {
00996         return 0;
00997     }
00998 
00999     evbuffer_add_printf(bufferevent_get_output(c->bev),
01000                         "HTTP/%d.%d 100 Continue\r\n\r\n",
01001                         htparser_get_major(p),
01002                         htparser_get_minor(p));
01003 
01004     return 0;
01005 }
01006 
01007 static int
01008 _evhtp_request_parser_body(htparser * p, const char * data, size_t len) {
01009     evhtp_connection_t * c   = htparser_get_userdata(p);
01010     evbuf_t            * buf = evbuffer_new();
01011     int                  res = 0;
01012 
01013     evbuffer_add(buf, data, len);
01014 
01015     if ((c->request->status = _evhtp_body_hook(c->request, buf)) != EVHTP_RES_OK) {
01016         res = -1;
01017     }
01018 
01019     if (evbuffer_get_length(buf)) {
01020         evbuffer_add_buffer(c->request->buffer_in, buf);
01021     }
01022 
01023     evbuffer_free(buf);
01024 
01025     return res;
01026 }
01027 
01028 static int
01029 _evhtp_request_parser_chunk_new(htparser * p) {
01030     evhtp_connection_t * c = htparser_get_userdata(p);
01031 
01032     if ((c->request->status = _evhtp_chunk_new_hook(c->request,
01033                                                     htparser_get_content_length(p))) != EVHTP_RES_OK) {
01034         return -1;
01035     }
01036 
01037     return 0;
01038 }
01039 
01040 static int
01041 _evhtp_request_parser_chunk_fini(htparser * p) {
01042     evhtp_connection_t * c = htparser_get_userdata(p);
01043 
01044     if ((c->request->status = _evhtp_chunk_fini_hook(c->request)) != EVHTP_RES_OK) {
01045         return -1;
01046     }
01047 
01048     return 0;
01049 }
01050 
01051 static int
01052 _evhtp_request_parser_chunks_fini(htparser * p) {
01053     evhtp_connection_t * c = htparser_get_userdata(p);
01054 
01055     if ((c->request->status = _evhtp_chunks_fini_hook(c->request)) != EVHTP_RES_OK) {
01056         return -1;
01057     }
01058 
01059     return 0;
01060 }
01061 
01062 static int
01063 _evhtp_request_parser_fini(htparser * p) {
01064     evhtp_connection_t * c = htparser_get_userdata(p);
01065 
01066     /* c->request->finished = 1; */
01067 
01068     if (c->request->cb) {
01069         (c->request->cb)(c->request, c->request->cbarg);
01070     }
01071 
01072     return 0;
01073 }
01074 
01075 static int
01076 _evhtp_create_headers(evhtp_header_t * header, void * arg) {
01077     evbuf_t * buf = arg;
01078 
01079     evbuffer_add(buf, header->key, header->klen);
01080     evbuffer_add(buf, ": ", 2);
01081     evbuffer_add(buf, header->val, header->vlen);
01082     evbuffer_add(buf, "\r\n", 2);
01083     return 0;
01084 }
01085 
01086 static evbuf_t *
01087 _evhtp_create_reply(evhtp_request_t * request, evhtp_res code) {
01088     evbuf_t * buf = evbuffer_new();
01089 
01090     if (evbuffer_get_length(request->buffer_out)) {
01091         /* add extra headers (like content-length/type) if not already present */
01092 
01093         if (!evhtp_header_find(request->headers_out, "Content-Length")) {
01094             char lstr[23];
01095 
01096             snprintf(lstr, sizeof(lstr), "%" PRIuMAX,
01097                      evbuffer_get_length(request->buffer_out));
01098 
01099             evhtp_headers_add_header(request->headers_out,
01100                                      evhtp_header_new("Content-Length", lstr, 0, 1));
01101         }
01102 
01103         if (!evhtp_header_find(request->headers_out, "Content-Type")) {
01104             evhtp_headers_add_header(request->headers_out,
01105                                      evhtp_header_new("Content-Type", "text/plain", 0, 0));
01106         }
01107     } else {
01108         if (!evhtp_header_find(request->headers_out, "Content-Length")) {
01109             const char * chunked = evhtp_header_find(request->headers_out,
01110                                                      "transfer-encoding");
01111 
01112             if (!chunked || !strstr(chunked, "chunked")) {
01113                 evhtp_headers_add_header(request->headers_out,
01114                                          evhtp_header_new("Content-Length", "0", 0, 0));
01115             }
01116         }
01117     }
01118 
01119 
01120     /* add the proper keep-alive type headers based on http version */
01121     switch (request->proto) {
01122         case EVHTP_PROTO_11:
01123             if (request->keepalive == 0) {
01124                 /* protocol is HTTP/1.1 but client wanted to close */
01125                 evhtp_headers_add_header(request->headers_out,
01126                                          evhtp_header_new("Connection", "close", 0, 0));
01127             }
01128             break;
01129         case EVHTP_PROTO_10:
01130             if (request->keepalive == 1) {
01131                 /* protocol is HTTP/1.0 and clients wants to keep established */
01132                 evhtp_headers_add_header(request->headers_out,
01133                                          evhtp_header_new("Connection", "keep-alive", 0, 0));
01134             }
01135             break;
01136         default:
01137             break;
01138     }
01139 
01140     /* add the status line */
01141     evbuffer_add_printf(buf, "HTTP/%d.%d %d %s\r\n",
01142                         htparser_get_major(request->conn->parser),
01143                         htparser_get_minor(request->conn->parser),
01144                         code, status_code_to_str(code));
01145 
01146     evhtp_headers_for_each(request->headers_out, _evhtp_create_headers, buf);
01147     evbuffer_add_reference(buf, "\r\n", 2, NULL, NULL);
01148 
01149     if (evbuffer_get_length(request->buffer_out)) {
01150         evbuffer_add_buffer(buf, request->buffer_out);
01151     }
01152 
01153     return buf;
01154 }     /* _evhtp_create_reply */
01155 
01156 static void
01157 _evhtp_connection_resumecb(int fd, short events, void * arg) {
01158     evhtp_connection_t * c = arg;
01159 
01160     if (c->request) {
01161         c->request->status = EVHTP_RES_OK;
01162     }
01163 
01164     return _evhtp_connection_readcb(c->bev, c);
01165 }
01166 
01167 static void
01168 _evhtp_connection_readcb(evbev_t * bev, void * arg) {
01169     evhtp_connection_t * c = arg;
01170     void               * buf;
01171     size_t               nread;
01172     size_t               avail;
01173 
01174     if (c->request) {
01175         c->request->status = EVHTP_RES_OK;
01176     }
01177 
01178     avail = evbuffer_get_length(bufferevent_get_input(bev));
01179     buf   = evbuffer_pullup(bufferevent_get_input(bev), avail);
01180     nread = htparser_run(c->parser, &request_psets, (const char *)buf, avail);
01181 
01182     if (avail != nread) {
01183         if (c->request && c->request->status == EVHTP_RES_PAUSE) {
01184             evhtp_request_pause(c->request);
01185         } else {
01186             _evhtp_connection_free(c);
01187             return;
01188         }
01189     }
01190 
01191     evbuffer_drain(bufferevent_get_input(bev), nread);
01192 }
01193 
01194 static void
01195 _evhtp_connection_writecb(evbev_t * bev, void * arg) {
01196     evhtp_connection_t * c = arg;
01197 
01198     if (c->request == NULL) {
01199         return;
01200     }
01201 
01202     if (c->request->finished == 0 || evbuffer_get_length(bufferevent_get_output(bev))) {
01203         return;
01204     }
01205 
01206     if (c->request->keepalive) {
01207         _evhtp_request_free(c->request);
01208         c->request = NULL;
01209 
01210         htparser_init(c->parser, htp_type_request);
01211         return htparser_set_userdata(c->parser, c);
01212     } else {
01213         return _evhtp_connection_free(c);
01214     }
01215 
01216     return;
01217 }
01218 
01219 static void
01220 _evhtp_connection_eventcb(evbev_t * bev, short events, void * arg) {
01221     if ((events & BEV_EVENT_CONNECTED)) {
01222         return;
01223     }
01224 
01225     evhtp_connection_t * c = arg;
01226     c->error = 1;
01227 
01228     if (c->request) {
01229         c->request->error = 1;
01230     }
01231 
01232     return _evhtp_connection_free((evhtp_connection_t *)arg);
01233 }
01234 
01235 static int
01236 _evhtp_connection_accept(evbase_t * evbase, evhtp_connection_t * connection) {
01237 #ifndef DISABLE_SSL
01238     if (connection->htp->ssl_ctx != NULL) {
01239         connection->ssl_ctx = SSL_new(connection->htp->ssl_ctx);
01240         connection->bev     = bufferevent_openssl_socket_new(evbase,
01241                                                              connection->sock, connection->ssl_ctx,
01242                                                              BUFFEREVENT_SSL_ACCEPTING,
01243                                                              BEV_OPT_CLOSE_ON_FREE | BEV_OPT_DEFER_CALLBACKS);
01244         SSL_set_app_data(connection->ssl_ctx, connection);
01245         goto end;
01246     }
01247 #endif
01248 
01249     connection->bev = bufferevent_socket_new(evbase, connection->sock,
01250                                              BEV_OPT_CLOSE_ON_FREE | BEV_OPT_DEFER_CALLBACKS);
01251 end:
01252 
01253     bufferevent_set_timeouts(connection->bev,
01254                              connection->htp->recv_timeo,
01255                              connection->htp->send_timeo);
01256 
01257     connection->resume_ev = event_new(evbase, -1, EV_READ | EV_PERSIST,
01258                                       _evhtp_connection_resumecb, connection);
01259     event_add(connection->resume_ev, NULL);
01260 
01261     bufferevent_enable(connection->bev, EV_READ);
01262     bufferevent_setcb(connection->bev,
01263                       _evhtp_connection_readcb,
01264                       _evhtp_connection_writecb,
01265                       _evhtp_connection_eventcb,
01266                       connection);
01267 
01268     return 0;
01269 }     /* _evhtp_connection_accept */
01270 
01271 static void
01272 _evhtp_default_request_cb(evhtp_request_t * request, void * arg) {
01273     return evhtp_send_reply(request, EVHTP_RES_NOTFOUND);
01274 }
01275 
01276 static evhtp_connection_t *
01277 _evhtp_connection_new(evhtp_t * htp, int sock) {
01278     evhtp_connection_t * connection;
01279 
01280     if (!(connection = malloc(sizeof(evhtp_connection_t)))) {
01281         return NULL;
01282     }
01283 
01284     connection->evbase    = NULL;
01285     connection->bev       = NULL;
01286     connection->thread    = NULL;
01287     connection->ssl_ctx   = NULL;
01288     connection->hooks     = NULL;
01289     connection->request   = NULL;
01290     connection->resume_ev = NULL;
01291     connection->error     = 0;
01292     connection->sock      = sock;
01293     connection->htp       = htp;
01294     connection->parser    = htparser_new();
01295 
01296     htparser_init(connection->parser, htp_type_request);
01297     htparser_set_userdata(connection->parser, connection);
01298 
01299     return connection;
01300 }
01301 
01302 static void
01303 _evhtp_shutdown_eventcb(evbev_t * bev, short events, void * arg) {
01304 }
01305 
01306 static void
01307 _evhtp_connection_free(evhtp_connection_t * connection) {
01308     if (connection == NULL) {
01309         return;
01310     }
01311 
01312     _evhtp_request_free(connection->request);
01313     _evhtp_connection_fini_hook(connection);
01314 
01315     if (connection->parser) {
01316         free(connection->parser);
01317     }
01318 
01319     if (connection->resume_ev) {
01320         event_free(connection->resume_ev);
01321     }
01322 
01323     if (connection->bev) {
01324 #ifdef LIBEVENT_HAS_SHUTDOWN
01325         bufferevent_shutdown(connection->bev, _evhtp_shutdown_eventcb);
01326 #else
01327         if (connection->ssl_ctx != NULL) {
01328             SSL_set_shutdown(connection->ssl_ctx,
01329                              SSL_SENT_SHUTDOWN | SSL_RECEIVED_SHUTDOWN);
01330             SSL_shutdown(connection->ssl_ctx);
01331         }
01332         bufferevent_free(connection->bev);
01333 #endif
01334     }
01335 
01336     if (connection->hooks) {
01337         free(connection->hooks);
01338     }
01339 
01340     if (connection->thread) {
01341         evthr_dec_backlog(connection->thread);
01342     }
01343 
01344     if (connection->saddr) {
01345         free(connection->saddr);
01346     }
01347 
01348     free(connection);
01349 }     /* _evhtp_connection_free */
01350 
01351 static int
01352 _evhtp_run_pre_accept(evhtp_t * htp, int sock, struct sockaddr * s, int sl) {
01353     void    * args;
01354     evhtp_res res;
01355 
01356     if (htp->defaults.pre_accept == NULL) {
01357         return 0;
01358     }
01359 
01360     args = htp->defaults.pre_accept_cbarg;
01361     res  = htp->defaults.pre_accept(sock, s, sl, args);
01362 
01363     if (res != EVHTP_RES_OK) {
01364         return -1;
01365     }
01366 
01367     return 0;
01368 }
01369 
01370 static int
01371 _evhtp_run_post_accept(evhtp_t * htp, evhtp_connection_t * connection) {
01372     void    * args;
01373     evhtp_res res;
01374 
01375     if (htp->defaults.post_accept == NULL) {
01376         return 0;
01377     }
01378 
01379     args = htp->defaults.post_accept_cbarg;
01380     res  = htp->defaults.post_accept(connection, args);
01381 
01382     if (res != EVHTP_RES_OK) {
01383         return -1;
01384     }
01385 
01386     return 0;
01387 }
01388 
01389 static void
01390 _evhtp_run_in_thread(evthr_t * thr, void * arg, void * shared) {
01391     evhtp_t            * htp        = shared;
01392     evhtp_connection_t * connection = arg;
01393 
01394     connection->evbase = evthr_get_base(thr);
01395     connection->thread = thr;
01396 
01397     evthr_inc_backlog(connection->thread);
01398 
01399     if (_evhtp_connection_accept(connection->evbase, connection) < 0) {
01400         return _evhtp_connection_free(connection);
01401     }
01402 
01403     if (_evhtp_run_post_accept(htp, connection) < 0) {
01404         return _evhtp_connection_free(connection);
01405     }
01406 }
01407 
01408 static void
01409 _evhtp_accept_cb(evserv_t * serv, int fd, struct sockaddr * s, int sl, void * arg) {
01410     evhtp_t            * htp = arg;
01411     evhtp_connection_t * connection;
01412 
01413     if (_evhtp_run_pre_accept(htp, fd, s, sl) < 0) {
01414         return;
01415     }
01416 
01417     if (!(connection = _evhtp_connection_new(htp, fd))) {
01418         return;
01419     }
01420 
01421     connection->saddr = malloc(sl);
01422     memcpy(connection->saddr, s, sl);
01423 
01424     if (htp->thr_pool != NULL) {
01425         evthr_pool_defer(htp->thr_pool, _evhtp_run_in_thread, connection);
01426         return;
01427     }
01428 
01429     connection->evbase = htp->evbase;
01430 
01431     if (_evhtp_connection_accept(htp->evbase, connection) < 0) {
01432         return _evhtp_connection_free(connection);
01433     }
01434 
01435     if (_evhtp_run_post_accept(htp, connection) < 0) {
01436         return _evhtp_connection_free(connection);
01437     }
01438 }
01439 
01440 #ifndef DISABLE_SSL
01441 static unsigned long
01442 _evhtp_ssl_get_thread_id(void) {
01443     return (unsigned long)pthread_self();
01444 }
01445 
01446 static void
01447 _evhtp_ssl_thread_lock(int mode, int type, const char * file, int line) {
01448     if (type < ssl_num_locks) {
01449         if (mode & CRYPTO_LOCK) {
01450             pthread_mutex_lock(&(ssl_locks[type]));
01451         } else {
01452             pthread_mutex_unlock(&(ssl_locks[type]));
01453         }
01454     }
01455 }
01456 
01457 static void
01458 _evhtp_ssl_delete_scache_ent(evhtp_ssl_ctx_t * ctx, evhtp_ssl_sess_t * sess) {
01459     evhtp_t         * htp;
01460     evhtp_ssl_cfg_t * cfg;
01461     unsigned char   * sid;
01462     unsigned int      slen;
01463 
01464     htp  = (evhtp_t *)SSL_CTX_get_app_data(ctx);
01465     cfg  = htp->ssl_cfg;
01466 
01467     sid  = sess->session_id;
01468     slen = sess->session_id_length;
01469 
01470     if (cfg->scache_del) {
01471         (cfg->scache_del)(htp, sid, slen);
01472     }
01473 }
01474 
01475 static int
01476 _evhtp_ssl_add_scache_ent(evhtp_ssl_t * ssl, evhtp_ssl_sess_t * sess) {
01477     evhtp_connection_t * connection;
01478     evhtp_ssl_cfg_t    * cfg;
01479     unsigned char      * sid;
01480     int                  slen;
01481 
01482     connection = (evhtp_connection_t *)SSL_get_app_data(ssl);
01483     cfg        = connection->htp->ssl_cfg;
01484 
01485     sid        = sess->session_id;
01486     slen       = sess->session_id_length;
01487 
01488     SSL_set_timeout(sess, cfg->scache_timeout);
01489 
01490     if (cfg->scache_add) {
01491         return (cfg->scache_add)(connection, sid, slen, sess);
01492     }
01493 
01494     return 0;
01495 }
01496 
01497 static evhtp_ssl_sess_t *
01498 _evhtp_ssl_get_scache_ent(evhtp_ssl_t * ssl, unsigned char * sid, int sid_len, int * copy) {
01499     evhtp_connection_t * connection;
01500     evhtp_ssl_cfg_t    * cfg;
01501     evhtp_ssl_sess_t   * sess;
01502 
01503     connection = (evhtp_connection_t * )SSL_get_app_data(ssl);
01504     cfg        = connection->htp->ssl_cfg;
01505     sess       = NULL;
01506 
01507     if (cfg->scache_get) {
01508         sess = (cfg->scache_get)(connection, sid, sid_len);
01509     }
01510 
01511     *copy = 0;
01512 
01513     return sess;
01514 }

01532 void
01533 evhtp_connection_pause(evhtp_connection_t * c) {
01534     if ((bufferevent_get_enabled(c->bev) & EV_READ)) {
01535         bufferevent_disable(c->bev, EV_READ);
01536     }
01537 }
01538 
01544 void
01545 evhtp_connection_resume(evhtp_connection_t * c) {
01546     if (!(bufferevent_get_enabled(c->bev) & EV_READ)) {
01547         bufferevent_enable(c->bev, EV_READ);
01548         event_active(c->resume_ev, EV_WRITE, 1);
01549     }
01550 }
01551 
01559 void
01560 evhtp_request_pause(evhtp_request_t * request) {
01561     return evhtp_connection_pause(request->conn);
01562 }
01563 
01571 void
01572 evhtp_request_resume(evhtp_request_t * request) {
01573     return evhtp_connection_resume(request->conn);
01574 }
01575 
01576 evhtp_header_t *
01577 evhtp_header_key_add(evhtp_headers_t * headers, const char * key, char kalloc) {
01578     evhtp_header_t * header;
01579 
01580     if (!(header = evhtp_header_new(key, NULL, kalloc, 0))) {
01581         return NULL;
01582     }
01583 
01584     evhtp_headers_add_header(headers, header);
01585 
01586     return header;
01587 }
01588 
01589 evhtp_header_t *
01590 evhtp_header_val_add(evhtp_headers_t * headers, const char * val, char valloc) {
01591     evhtp_header_t * header = TAILQ_LAST(headers, evhtp_headers_s);
01592 
01593     if (header == NULL) {
01594         return NULL;
01595     }
01596 
01597     header->vlen = strlen(val);
01598 
01599     if (valloc == 1) {
01600         header->val = malloc(header->vlen + 1);
01601         header->val[header->vlen] = '\0';
01602         memcpy(header->val, val, header->vlen);
01603     } else {
01604         header->val = (char *)val;
01605     }
01606 
01607     header->v_heaped = valloc;
01608 
01609     return header;
01610 }
01611 
01612 evhtp_kvs_t *
01613 evhtp_kvs_new(void) {
01614     evhtp_kvs_t * kvs = malloc(sizeof(evhtp_kvs_t));
01615 
01616     TAILQ_INIT(kvs);
01617     return kvs;
01618 }
01619 
01620 evhtp_kv_t *
01621 evhtp_kv_new(const char * key, const char * val, char kalloc, char valloc) {
01622     evhtp_kv_t * kv;
01623 
01624     if (!(kv = malloc(sizeof(evhtp_kv_t)))) {
01625         return NULL;
01626     }
01627 
01628     kv->k_heaped = kalloc;
01629     kv->v_heaped = valloc;
01630     kv->klen     = 0;
01631     kv->vlen     = 0;
01632 
01633     if (key != NULL) {
01634         kv->klen = strlen(key);
01635 
01636         if (kalloc == 1) {
01637             char * s = malloc(kv->klen + 1);
01638 
01639             s[kv->klen] = '\0';
01640             memcpy(s, key, kv->klen);
01641             kv->key     = s;
01642         } else {
01643             kv->key = (char *)key;
01644         }
01645     }
01646 
01647     if (val != NULL) {
01648         kv->vlen = strlen(val);
01649 
01650         if (valloc == 1) {
01651             char * s = malloc(kv->vlen + 1);
01652 
01653             s[kv->vlen] = '\0';
01654             memcpy(s, val, kv->vlen);
01655             kv->val     = s;
01656         } else {
01657             kv->val = (char *)val;
01658         }
01659     }
01660 
01661     return kv;
01662 }     /* evhtp_kv_new */
01663 
01664 void
01665 evhtp_kv_free(evhtp_kv_t * kv) {
01666     if (kv == NULL) {
01667         return;
01668     }
01669 
01670     if (kv->k_heaped && kv->key) {
01671         free(kv->key);
01672     }
01673 
01674     if (kv->v_heaped && kv->val) {
01675         free(kv->val);
01676     }
01677 
01678     free(kv);
01679 }
01680 
01681 void
01682 evhtp_kv_rm_and_free(evhtp_kvs_t * kvs, evhtp_kv_t * kv) {
01683     if (kvs == NULL || kv == NULL) {
01684         return;
01685     }
01686 
01687     TAILQ_REMOVE(kvs, kv, next);
01688 
01689     evhtp_kv_free(kv);
01690 }
01691 
01692 void
01693 evhtp_kvs_free(evhtp_kvs_t * kvs) {
01694     evhtp_kv_t * kv;
01695     evhtp_kv_t * save;
01696 
01697     if (kvs == NULL) {
01698         return;
01699     }
01700 
01701     for (kv = TAILQ_FIRST(kvs); kv != NULL; kv = save) {
01702         save = TAILQ_NEXT(kv, next);
01703 
01704         TAILQ_REMOVE(kvs, kv, next);
01705 
01706         evhtp_kv_free(kv);
01707     }
01708 
01709     free(kvs);
01710 }
01711 
01712 int
01713 evhtp_kvs_for_each(evhtp_kvs_t * kvs, evhtp_kvs_iterator cb, void * arg) {
01714     evhtp_kv_t * kv;
01715 
01716     TAILQ_FOREACH(kv, kvs, next) {
01717         int res;
01718 
01719         if ((res = cb(kv, arg))) {
01720             return res;
01721         }
01722     }
01723 
01724     return 0;
01725 }
01726 
01727 const char *
01728 evhtp_kv_find(evhtp_kvs_t * kvs, const char * key) {
01729     evhtp_kv_t * kv;
01730 
01731     if (kvs == NULL || key == NULL) {
01732         return NULL;
01733     }
01734 
01735     TAILQ_FOREACH(kv, kvs, next) {
01736         if (strcasecmp(kv->key, key) == 0) {
01737             return kv->val;
01738         }
01739     }
01740 
01741     return NULL;
01742 }
01743 
01744 evhtp_kv_t *
01745 evhtp_kvs_find_kv(evhtp_kvs_t * kvs, const char * key) {
01746     evhtp_kv_t * kv;
01747 
01748     if (kvs == NULL || key == NULL) {
01749         return NULL;
01750     }
01751 
01752     TAILQ_FOREACH(kv, kvs, next) {
01753         if (strcasecmp(kv->key, key) == 0) {
01754             return kv;
01755         }
01756     }
01757 
01758     return NULL;
01759 }
01760 
01761 void
01762 evhtp_kvs_add_kv(evhtp_kvs_t * kvs, evhtp_kv_t * kv) {
01763     if (kvs == NULL || kv == NULL) {
01764         return;
01765     }
01766 
01767     TAILQ_INSERT_TAIL(kvs, kv, next);
01768 }
01769 
01770 typedef enum {
01771     s_query_start = 0,
01772     s_query_question_mark,
01773     s_query_separator,
01774     s_query_key,
01775     s_query_val,
01776     s_query_key_hex_1,
01777     s_query_key_hex_2,
01778     s_query_val_hex_1,
01779     s_query_val_hex_2,
01780     s_query_done
01781 } query_parser_state;
01782 
01783 evhtp_query_t *
01784 evhtp_parse_query(const char * query, size_t len) {
01785     evhtp_query_t    * query_args;
01786     query_parser_state state = s_query_start;
01787     char               key_buf[1024];
01788     char               val_buf[1024];
01789     int                key_idx;
01790     int                val_idx;
01791     int                res;
01792     unsigned char      ch;
01793     size_t             i;
01794 
01795     query_args = evhtp_query_new();
01796 
01797     key_idx    = 0;
01798     val_idx    = 0;
01799 
01800     for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
01801         res = 0;
01802         ch  = query[i];
01803 
01804         if (key_idx >= sizeof(key_buf) || val_idx >= sizeof(val_buf)) {
01805             res = -1;
01806             goto error;
01807         }
01808 
01809         switch (state) {
01810             case s_query_start:
01811                 memset(key_buf, 0, sizeof(key_buf));
01812                 memset(val_buf, 0, sizeof(val_buf));
01813 
01814                 key_idx = 0;
01815                 val_idx = 0;
01816 
01817                 switch (ch) {
01818                     case '?':
01819                         state = s_query_key;
01820                         break;
01821                     case '/':
01822                         state = s_query_question_mark;
01823                         break;
01824                     default:
01825                         state = s_query_key;
01826                         goto query_key;
01827                 }
01828 
01829                 break;
01830             case s_query_question_mark:
01831                 switch (ch) {
01832                     case '?':
01833                         state = s_query_key;
01834                         break;
01835                     case '/':
01836                         state = s_query_question_mark;
01837                         break;
01838                     default:
01839                         res   = -1;
01840                         goto error;
01841                 }
01842                 break;
01843 query_key:
01844             case s_query_key:
01845                 switch (ch) {
01846                     case '=':
01847                         state = s_query_val;
01848                         break;
01849                     case '%':
01850                         key_buf[key_idx++] = ch;
01851                         key_buf[key_idx] = '\0';
01852                         state = s_query_key_hex_1;
01853                         break;
01854                     default:
01855                         key_buf[key_idx++] = ch;
01856                         key_buf[key_idx]   = '\0';
01857                         break;
01858                 }
01859                 break;
01860             case s_query_key_hex_1:
01861                 if (!isalnum(ch) || ispunct(ch)) {
01862                     res = -1;
01863                     goto error;
01864                 }
01865 
01866                 key_buf[key_idx++] = ch;
01867                 key_buf[key_idx]   = '\0';
01868 
01869                 state = s_query_key_hex_2;
01870                 break;
01871             case s_query_key_hex_2:
01872                 if (!isalnum(ch) || ispunct(ch)) {
01873                     res = -1;
01874                     goto error;
01875                 }
01876 
01877                 key_buf[key_idx++] = ch;
01878                 key_buf[key_idx]   = '\0';
01879 
01880                 state = s_query_key;
01881                 break;
01882             case s_query_val:
01883                 switch (ch) {
01884                     case ';':
01885                     case '&':
01886                         evhtp_kvs_add_kv(query_args, evhtp_kv_new(key_buf, val_buf, 1, 1));
01887 
01888                         memset(key_buf, 0, sizeof(key_buf));
01889                         memset(val_buf, 0, sizeof(val_buf));
01890 
01891                         key_idx            = 0;
01892                         val_idx            = 0;
01893 
01894                         state              = s_query_key;
01895 
01896                         break;
01897                     case '%':
01898                         val_buf[val_idx++] = ch;
01899                         val_buf[val_idx]   = '\0';
01900 
01901                         state              = s_query_val_hex_1;
01902                         break;
01903                     default:
01904                         val_buf[val_idx++] = ch;
01905                         val_buf[val_idx]   = '\0';
01906 
01907                         break;
01908                 }     /* switch */
01909                 break;
01910             case s_query_val_hex_1:
01911                 if (!isalnum(ch) || ispunct(ch)) {
01912                     res = -1;
01913                     goto error;
01914                 }
01915 
01916                 val_buf[val_idx++] = ch;
01917                 val_buf[val_idx]   = '\0';
01918 
01919                 state = s_query_val_hex_2;
01920                 break;
01921             case s_query_val_hex_2:
01922                 if (!isalnum(ch) || ispunct(ch)) {
01923                     res = -1;
01924                     goto error;
01925                 }
01926 
01927                 val_buf[val_idx++] = ch;
01928                 val_buf[val_idx]   = '\0';
01929 
01930                 state = s_query_val;
01931                 break;
01932             default:
01933                 /* bad state */
01934                 res   = -1;
01935                 goto error;
01936         }       /* switch */
01937     }
01938 
01939     if (key_idx && val_idx) {
01940         evhtp_kvs_add_kv(query_args, evhtp_kv_new(key_buf, val_buf, 1, 1));
01941     }
01942 
01943     return query_args;
01944 error:
01945     return NULL;
01946 }     /* evhtp_parse_query */
01947 
01948 void
01949 evhtp_send_reply_start(evhtp_request_t * request, evhtp_res code) {
01950     evhtp_connection_t * c = request->conn;
01951     evbuf_t            * reply_buf;
01952 
01953     if (!(reply_buf = _evhtp_create_reply(request, code))) {
01954         return _evhtp_connection_free(c);
01955     }
01956 
01957     bufferevent_write_buffer(c->bev, reply_buf);
01958     evbuffer_free(reply_buf);
01959 }
01960 
01961 void
01962 evhtp_send_reply_body(evhtp_request_t * request, evbuf_t * buf) {
01963     evhtp_connection_t * c = request->conn;
01964 
01965     bufferevent_write_buffer(c->bev, buf);
01966 }
01967 
01968 void
01969 evhtp_send_reply_end(evhtp_request_t * request) {
01970     request->finished = 1;
01971     bufferevent_flush(request->conn->bev, EV_WRITE, BEV_FLUSH);
01972     /*
01973      * bufferevent_write(request->conn->bev, "", 0);
01974      * return _evhtp_connection_writecb(request->conn->bev, request->conn);
01975      */
01976 }
01977 
01978 void
01979 evhtp_send_reply(evhtp_request_t * request, evhtp_res code) {
01980     evhtp_connection_t * c = request->conn;
01981     evbuf_t            * reply_buf;
01982 
01983     request->finished = 1;
01984 
01985     if (!(reply_buf = _evhtp_create_reply(request, code))) {
01986         return _evhtp_connection_free(request->conn);
01987     }
01988 
01989     bufferevent_write_buffer(c->bev, reply_buf);
01990     evbuffer_free(reply_buf);
01991 }
01992 
01993 int
01994 evhtp_bind_socket(evhtp_t * htp, const char * baddr, uint16_t port, int backlog) {
01995     struct sockaddr_in  sin;
01996     struct sockaddr_in6 sin6;
01997     struct sockaddr   * sa;
01998     size_t              sin_len;
01999 
02000     memset(&sin, 0, sizeof(sin));
02001 
02002     if (strstr(baddr, ":")) {
02003         memset(&sin6, 0, sizeof(sin6));
02004 
02005         sin_len          = sizeof(struct sockaddr_in6);
02006         sin6.sin6_port   = htons(port);
02007         sin6.sin6_family = AF_INET6;
02008 
02009         evutil_inet_pton(AF_INET6, baddr, &sin6.sin6_addr);
02010         sa = (struct sockaddr *)&sin6;
02011     } else {
02012         sin_len             = sizeof(struct sockaddr_in);
02013 
02014         sin.sin_family      = AF_INET;
02015         sin.sin_port        = htons(port);
02016         sin.sin_addr.s_addr = inet_addr(baddr);
02017 
02018         sa = (struct sockaddr *)&sin;
02019     }
02020 
02021     signal(SIGPIPE, SIG_IGN);
02022 
02023     htp->server = evconnlistener_new_bind(htp->evbase, _evhtp_accept_cb, (void *)htp,
02024                                           LEV_OPT_CLOSE_ON_FREE | LEV_OPT_REUSEABLE,
02025                                           backlog, sa, sin_len);
02026     return htp->server ? 0 : -1;
02027 }
02028 
02029 evhtp_callbacks_t *
02030 evhtp_callbacks_new(unsigned int buckets) {
02031     evhtp_callbacks_t * cbs;
02032 
02033     if (!(cbs = calloc(sizeof(evhtp_callbacks_t), 1))) {
02034         return NULL;
02035     }
02036 
02037     if (!(cbs->callbacks = calloc(sizeof(evhtp_callback_t *), buckets))) {
02038         free(cbs);
02039         return NULL;
02040     }
02041 
02042     cbs->buckets = buckets;
02043     cbs->count   = 0;
02044 
02045     return cbs;
02046 }
02047 
02048 void
02049 evhtp_callbacks_free(evhtp_callbacks_t * callbacks) {
02050     evhtp_callback_t * callback;
02051     evhtp_callback_t * next;
02052     unsigned int       idx;
02053 
02054     if (callbacks == NULL) {
02055         return;
02056     }
02057 
02058     if (callbacks->callbacks) {
02059         for (idx = 0; idx < callbacks->buckets; idx++) {
02060             if (callbacks->callbacks[idx] == NULL) {
02061                 continue;
02062             }
02063 
02064             callback = callbacks->callbacks[idx];
02065 
02066             while (callback != NULL) {
02067                 next     = callback->next;
02068                 evhtp_callback_free(callback);
02069                 callback = next;
02070             }
02071         }
02072         free(callbacks->callbacks);
02073     }
02074 
02075     callback = callbacks->regex_callbacks;
02076 
02077     while (callback != NULL) {
02078         next     = callback->next;
02079         evhtp_callback_free(callback);
02080         callback = next;
02081     }
02082 
02083     free(callbacks);
02084 }
02085 
02086 evhtp_callback_t *
02087 evhtp_callback_new(const char * path, evhtp_callback_type type, evhtp_callback_cb cb, void * arg) {
02088     evhtp_callback_t * hcb;
02089 
02090     if (!(hcb = calloc(sizeof(evhtp_callback_t), 1))) {
02091         return NULL;
02092     }
02093 
02094     hcb->type  = type;
02095     hcb->cb    = cb;
02096     hcb->cbarg = arg;
02097 
02098     switch (type) {
02099         case evhtp_callback_type_hash:
02100             hcb->hash      = _evhtp_quick_hash(path);
02101             hcb->val.path  = strdup(path);
02102             break;
02103         case evhtp_callback_type_regex:
02104             hcb->val.regex = malloc(sizeof(regex_t));
02105 
02106             if (regcomp(hcb->val.regex, (char *)path, REG_EXTENDED) != 0) {
02107                 free(hcb->val.regex);
02108                 free(hcb);
02109                 return NULL;
02110             }
02111             break;
02112         default:
02113             free(hcb);
02114             return NULL;
02115     }
02116 
02117     return hcb;
02118 }
02119 
02120 void
02121 evhtp_callback_free(evhtp_callback_t * callback) {
02122     if (callback == NULL) {
02123         return;
02124     }
02125 
02126     switch (callback->type) {
02127         case evhtp_callback_type_hash:
02128             if (callback->val.path) {
02129                 free(callback->val.path);
02130             }
02131             break;
02132         case evhtp_callback_type_regex:
02133             if (callback->val.regex) {
02134                 regfree(callback->val.regex);
02135             }
02136             break;
02137     }
02138 
02139     free(callback);
02140 
02141     return;
02142 }
02143 
02144 int
02145 evhtp_callbacks_add_callback(evhtp_callbacks_t * cbs, evhtp_callback_t * cb) {
02146     unsigned int hkey;
02147 
02148     switch (cb->type) {
02149         case evhtp_callback_type_hash:
02150             hkey = cb->hash & (cbs->buckets - 1);
02151 
02152             if (cbs->callbacks[hkey] == NULL) {
02153                 cbs->callbacks[hkey] = cb;
02154             } else {
02155                 cb->next = cbs->callbacks[hkey];
02156                 cbs->callbacks[hkey] = cb;
02157             }
02158             break;
02159         case evhtp_callback_type_regex:
02160             cb->next = cbs->regex_callbacks;
02161             cbs->regex_callbacks = cb;
02162             break;
02163         default:
02164             return -1;
02165     }
02166 
02167     return 0;
02168 }
02169 
02170 int
02171 evhtp_set_hook(evhtp_hooks_t ** hooks, evhtp_hook_type type, void * cb, void * arg) {
02172     if (*hooks == NULL) {
02173         if (!(*hooks = calloc(sizeof(evhtp_hooks_t), 1))) {
02174             return -1;
02175         }
02176     }
02177 
02178     switch (type) {
02179         case evhtp_hook_on_header:
02180             (*hooks)->on_header              = (evhtp_hook_header_cb)cb;
02181             (*hooks)->on_header_arg          = arg;
02182             break;
02183         case evhtp_hook_on_headers:
02184             (*hooks)->on_headers             = (evhtp_hook_headers_cb)cb;
02185             (*hooks)->on_headers_arg         = arg;
02186             break;
02187         case evhtp_hook_on_path:
02188             (*hooks)->on_path                = (evhtp_hook_path_cb)cb;
02189             (*hooks)->on_path_arg            = arg;
02190             break;
02191         case evhtp_hook_on_read:
02192             (*hooks)->on_read                = (evhtp_hook_read_cb)cb;
02193             (*hooks)->on_read_arg            = arg;
02194             break;
02195         case evhtp_hook_on_request_fini:
02196             (*hooks)->on_request_fini        = (evhtp_hook_request_fini_cb)cb;
02197             (*hooks)->on_request_fini_arg    = arg;
02198             break;
02199         case evhtp_hook_on_connection_fini:
02200             (*hooks)->on_connection_fini     = (evhtp_hook_connection_fini_cb)cb;
02201             (*hooks)->on_connection_fini_arg = arg;
02202             break;
02203         case evhtp_hook_on_error:
02204             (*hooks)->on_error               = (evhtp_hook_err_cb)cb;
02205             (*hooks)->on_error_arg           = arg;
02206             break;
02207         case evhtp_hook_on_new_chunk:
02208             (*hooks)->on_new_chunk           = (evhtp_hook_chunk_new_cb)cb;
02209             (*hooks)->on_new_chunk_arg       = arg;
02210             break;
02211         case evhtp_hook_on_chunk_complete:
02212             (*hooks)->on_chunk_fini          = (evhtp_hook_chunk_fini_cb)cb;
02213             (*hooks)->on_chunk_fini_arg      = arg;
02214             break;
02215         case evhtp_hook_on_chunks_complete:
02216             (*hooks)->on_chunks_fini         = (evhtp_hook_chunks_fini_cb)cb;
02217             (*hooks)->on_chunks_fini_arg     = arg;
02218             break;
02219         default:
02220             return -1;
02221     }     /* switch */
02222 
02223     return 0;
02224 }         /* evhtp_set_hook */
02225 
02226 evhtp_callback_t *
02227 evhtp_set_cb(evhtp_t * htp, const char * path, evhtp_callback_cb cb, void * arg) {
02228     evhtp_callback_t * hcb;
02229 
02230     _evhtp_lock(htp);
02231 
02232     if (htp->callbacks == NULL) {
02233         if (!(htp->callbacks = evhtp_callbacks_new(1024))) {
02234             _evhtp_unlock(htp);
02235             return NULL;
02236         }
02237     }
02238 
02239     if (!(hcb = evhtp_callback_new(path, evhtp_callback_type_hash, cb, arg))) {
02240         _evhtp_unlock(htp);
02241         return NULL;
02242     }
02243 
02244     if (evhtp_callbacks_add_callback(htp->callbacks, hcb)) {
02245         evhtp_callback_free(hcb);
02246         _evhtp_unlock(htp);
02247         return NULL;
02248     }
02249 
02250     _evhtp_unlock(htp);
02251 
02252     return hcb;
02253 }
02254 
02255 static void
02256 _evhtp_thread_init(evthr_t * thr, void * arg) {
02257     evhtp_t * htp = (evhtp_t *)arg;
02258 
02259     if (htp->thread_init_cb) {
02260         htp->thread_init_cb(htp, thr, htp->thread_init_cbarg);
02261     }
02262 }
02263 
02264 int
02265 evhtp_use_threads(evhtp_t * htp, evhtp_thread_init_cb init_cb, int nthreads, void * arg) {
02266     htp->thread_init_cb    = init_cb;
02267     htp->thread_init_cbarg = arg;
02268 
02269 #ifndef DISABLE_SSL
02270     evhtp_ssl_use_threads();
02271 #endif
02272 
02273     if (!(htp->thr_pool = evthr_pool_new(nthreads, _evhtp_thread_init, htp))) {
02274         return -1;
02275     }
02276 
02277     if (!(htp->lock = malloc(sizeof(pthread_mutex_t)))) {
02278         return -1;
02279     }
02280 
02281     pthread_mutex_init(htp->lock, NULL);
02282 
02283     evthr_pool_start(htp->thr_pool);
02284     return 0;
02285 }
02286 
02287 evhtp_callback_t *
02288 evhtp_set_regex_cb(evhtp_t * htp, const char * pattern, evhtp_callback_cb cb, void * arg) {
02289     evhtp_callback_t * hcb;
02290 
02291     _evhtp_lock(htp);
02292 
02293     if (htp->callbacks == NULL) {
02294         if (!(htp->callbacks = evhtp_callbacks_new(1024))) {
02295             _evhtp_unlock(htp);
02296             return NULL;
02297         }
02298     }
02299 
02300     if (!(hcb = evhtp_callback_new(pattern, evhtp_callback_type_regex, cb, arg))) {
02301         _evhtp_unlock(htp);
02302         return NULL;
02303     }
02304 
02305     if (evhtp_callbacks_add_callback(htp->callbacks, hcb)) {
02306         evhtp_callback_free(hcb);
02307         _evhtp_unlock(htp);
02308         return NULL;
02309     }
02310 
02311     _evhtp_unlock(htp);
02312     return hcb;
02313 }

02317     htp->defaults.cb    = cb;
02318     htp->defaults.cbarg = arg;
02319 }

02333 #ifndef DISABLE_SSL
02334 int
02335 evhtp_ssl_use_threads(void) {
02336     int i;
02337 
02338     if (ssl_locks_initialized == 1) {
02339         return 0;
02340     }
02341 
02342     ssl_locks_initialized = 1;
02343 
02344     ssl_num_locks         = CRYPTO_num_locks();
02345     ssl_locks = malloc(ssl_num_locks * sizeof(evhtp_mutex_t));
02346 
02347     for (i = 0; i < ssl_num_locks; i++) {
02348         pthread_mutex_init(&(ssl_locks[i]), NULL);
02349     }
02350 
02351     CRYPTO_set_id_callback(_evhtp_ssl_get_thread_id);
02352     CRYPTO_set_locking_callback(_evhtp_ssl_thread_lock);
02353 
02354     return 0;
02355 }
02356 
02357 int
02358 evhtp_ssl_init(evhtp_t * htp, evhtp_ssl_cfg_t * cfg) {
02359     long                  cache_mode;
02360     evhtp_ssl_scache_init init_cb = NULL;
02361     evhtp_ssl_scache_add  add_cb  = NULL;
02362     evhtp_ssl_scache_get  get_cb  = NULL;
02363     evhtp_ssl_scache_del  del_cb  = NULL;
02364 
02365     if (cfg == NULL || htp == NULL || cfg->pemfile == NULL) {
02366         return -1;
02367     }
02368 
02369     SSL_library_init();
02370     SSL_load_error_strings();
02371     RAND_poll();
02372 
02373     STACK_OF(SSL_COMP) * comp_methods = SSL_COMP_get_compression_methods();
02374     sk_SSL_COMP_zero(comp_methods);
02375 
02376     htp->ssl_cfg = cfg;
02377     htp->ssl_ctx = SSL_CTX_new(SSLv23_server_method());
02378 
02379 #if OPENSSL_VERSION_NUMBER >= 0x10000000L
02380     SSL_CTX_set_options(htp->ssl_ctx, SSL_MODE_RELEASE_BUFFERS);
02381 #endif
02382 
02383     SSL_CTX_set_options(htp->ssl_ctx, cfg->ssl_opts);
02384 
02385     if (cfg->ciphers != NULL) {
02386         SSL_CTX_set_cipher_list(htp->ssl_ctx, cfg->ciphers);
02387     }
02388 
02389     SSL_CTX_load_verify_locations(htp->ssl_ctx, cfg->cafile, cfg->capath);
02390     X509_STORE_set_flags(SSL_CTX_get_cert_store(htp->ssl_ctx), cfg->store_flags);
02391 
02392     if (cfg->x509_verify_cb != NULL) {
02393         SSL_CTX_set_verify(htp->ssl_ctx, cfg->verify_peer, cfg->x509_verify_cb);
02394     }
02395 
02396     if (cfg->x509_chk_issued_cb != NULL) {
02397         htp->ssl_ctx->cert_store->check_issued = cfg->x509_chk_issued_cb;
02398     }
02399 
02400     if (cfg->verify_depth) {
02401         SSL_CTX_set_verify_depth(htp->ssl_ctx, cfg->verify_depth);
02402     }
02403 
02404     switch (cfg->scache_type) {
02405         case evhtp_ssl_scache_type_disabled:
02406             cache_mode = SSL_SESS_CACHE_OFF;
02407             break;
02408         case evhtp_ssl_scache_type_user:
02409             cache_mode = SSL_SESS_CACHE_SERVER |
02410                          SSL_SESS_CACHE_NO_INTERNAL |
02411                          SSL_SESS_CACHE_NO_INTERNAL_LOOKUP;
02412 
02413             init_cb    = cfg->scache_init;
02414             add_cb     = cfg->scache_add;
02415             get_cb     = cfg->scache_get;
02416             del_cb     = cfg->scache_del;
02417             break;
02418         case evhtp_ssl_scache_type_builtin:
02419             cache_mode = SSL_SESS_CACHE_SERVER |
02420                          SSL_SESS_CACHE_NO_INTERNAL |
02421                          SSL_SESS_CACHE_NO_INTERNAL_LOOKUP;
02422 
02423 #if 0
02424             init_cb    = _evhtp_ssl_builtin_init;
02425             add_cb     = _evhtp_ssl_builtin_add;
02426             get_cb     = _evhtp_ssl_builtin_get;
02427             del_cb     = _evhtp_ssl_builtin_del;
02428 #endif
02429             break;
02430         case evhtp_ssl_scache_type_internal:
02431         default:
02432             cache_mode = SSL_SESS_CACHE_SERVER;
02433             break;
02434     }     /* switch */
02435 
02436     SSL_CTX_use_certificate_file(htp->ssl_ctx, cfg->pemfile, SSL_FILETYPE_PEM);
02437     SSL_CTX_use_PrivateKey_file(htp->ssl_ctx, cfg->privfile ? : cfg->pemfile, SSL_FILETYPE_PEM);
02438 
02439     SSL_CTX_set_session_id_context(htp->ssl_ctx,
02440                                    (void*)&session_id_context,
02441                                    sizeof(session_id_context));
02442 
02443     SSL_CTX_set_app_data(htp->ssl_ctx, htp);
02444     SSL_CTX_set_session_cache_mode(htp->ssl_ctx, cache_mode);
02445 
02446     if (cache_mode != SSL_SESS_CACHE_OFF) {
02447         SSL_CTX_sess_set_cache_size(htp->ssl_ctx,
02448                                     cfg->scache_size ? cfg->scache_size : 1024);
02449 
02450         if (cfg->scache_type == evhtp_ssl_scache_type_builtin ||
02451             cfg->scache_type == evhtp_ssl_scache_type_user) {
02452             SSL_CTX_sess_set_new_cb(htp->ssl_ctx, _evhtp_ssl_add_scache_ent);
02453             SSL_CTX_sess_set_get_cb(htp->ssl_ctx, _evhtp_ssl_get_scache_ent);
02454             SSL_CTX_sess_set_remove_cb(htp->ssl_ctx, _evhtp_ssl_delete_scache_ent);
02455 
02456             if (cfg->scache_init) {
02457                 cfg->args = (cfg->scache_init)(htp);
02458             }
02459         }
02460     }
02461 
02462     return 0;
02463 }     /* evhtp_use_ssl */
02464 
02465 #endif
02466 
02467 void
02468 evhtp_set_timeouts(evhtp_t * htp, struct timeval * r_timeo, struct timeval * w_timeo) {
02469     if (r_timeo != NULL) {
02470         htp->recv_timeo = malloc(sizeof(struct timeval));
02471         memcpy(htp->recv_timeo, r_timeo, sizeof(struct timeval));
02472     }
02473 
02474     if (w_timeo != NULL) {
02475         htp->send_timeo = malloc(sizeof(struct timeval));
02476         memcpy(htp->send_timeo, w_timeo, sizeof(struct timeval));
02477     }
02478 }
02479 
02480 evhtp_t *
02481 evhtp_new(evbase_t * evbase, void * arg) {
02482     evhtp_t * htp;
02483 
02484     if (evbase == NULL) {
02485         return NULL;
02486     }
02487 
02488     if (!(htp = calloc(sizeof(evhtp_t), 1))) {
02489         return NULL;
02490     }
02491 
02492     status_code_init();
02493 
02494     htp->arg         = arg;
02495     htp->evbase      = evbase;
02496     htp->server_name = "evhtp, sucka";
02497 
02498     evhtp_set_gencb(htp, _evhtp_default_request_cb, (void *)htp);
02499 
02500     return htp;
02501 }
